question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term best describes the fields that deal with cultural or artistic subjects?
description: The image depicts a cartoon-style illustration set against an orange background. A man dressed in a white lab coat with a green tie is seated atop a stack of large books. He has brown hair, a beard, and is wearing glasses perched on his head. In his right hand, he holds up a conical flask containing a blue liquid, suggesting a scientific experiment or demonstration. The books beneath him are labeled "LITERATURE," "HISTORY," and "PHILOSOPHY," each written in bold, capitalized letters on their spines. The books are stacked in descending order from top to bottom: Literature, History, and Philosophy. The man appears to be balancing himself on the books while conducting his activity. The overall scene combines elements of science (the flask) with academic disciplines traditionally associated with the humanities.
